title: Make WESTRIDGE Your Home For The SUMMER!
posting_body: ['Ask about our deal!!!', 'Westridge Apartments in Aurora, Co', 'Westridge Apartments in Aurora, Colorado is spread over 12 meticulously landscaped acres along the 66 mile Highline Canal Trail; which has become a reputable path for hikers, joggers, cyclists, bird watchers and others who yearn for a slice of the outdoors in the middle of a city.', "You'll be wonderfully close to many nearby attractions including the historical Delaney Farm, the Aurora History Museum and the 5 Golf Courses within 5 miles!", 'Buckley Air Force Base and the Community College of Aurora are only minutes away.', "Enjoy an easy drive to Denver International Airport or shop 'til you drop at the nearby Town Center at Aurora.", 'Our welcoming neighborhood will make you feel at home, and our unprecedented commitment to service will keep you happy to live here, long after you move in.', 'All of our one, two and three bedroom apartments are newly renovated and feature contemporary GE and Frigidaire stainless steel appliance packages; which include a self-cleaning oven, frost free refrigerator with ice maker, dishwasher, and an over the counter microwave.', 'Your new home will also have a beautiful luxury look with espresso cabinetry, upgraded lighting, two-tone paint with crown molding, and brushed nickel finishes.', 'Our residents enjoy our exceptional views of the Rocky Mountains in apartments that feature sunny over-sized windows, central heat and air conditioning, high-speed internet capability, and the convenience of a washer/dryer set in every home.', 'Every apartment also has a private patio or balcony and with limited access to each building, which can only be gained by key or code.', "Just outside your door you'll find lush, mature landscaping, and a beautiful clubhouse with money saving amenities: a state of the art fitness center; a resident business center complete with free wireless internet access, printer, and fax; a refreshing seasonal pool; and a playground for the young, and young at heart.", 'We are also a pet friendly community with plenty of room for your furry friends to roam.', "Come visit us in person; we'll be happy to show you around.", 'Our leasing office is conveniently open from 9am to 6pm Monday through Friday and from 10am to 4pm on Saturdays.', 'We invite you to preview our community by viewing our photo gallery.', 'Call or email today to schedule a personalized tour of our community.', 'Visit Westridge Apartments today and experience the luxury, location and convenience that will make you love where you live!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 935 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Built in Bookshelves*', '- In Wall USB Charging Ports', '- Patio/Balcony', '- Espresso Cabinetry', '- Extra Storage Available', '- Satellite Ready', '- Garbage Disposal', '- Dishwasher', '- Window Coverings', '- Espresso Plank Flooring', '- Brushed Nickel Hardware', '- Frost Free Freezers', '- Electric Self-Cleaning Oven', '- Washer Dryer', 'In Unit', '- Renovated Interiors', '- Crown Molding', '- Refrigerator with Ice Maker', '- Vaulted Ceilings', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Stainless Steel Double Sink', '- Mountain and Canal Views*', '- Two Tone Paint', '- Central Heat / Air Conditioning', '- Under Mount Microwave', '- Updated Light & Plumbing Fixtures', '- Pet Friendly', '*Select units only', 'Community Amenities', '- Easy Access Community College of Aurora', '- Playground', '- 24hr Emergency Maintenance', '- Fitness Center', '- Professional Landscapes', '- Copy/Fax/Printer', '- Easy Access to DIA and Buckley Air Force Base', '- Detached Garage', '- Credit Cards Accepted', '- Business Center with Wi-Fi', '- Easy Access to Towne Center at Aurora', '- Located on the RTD Bus-line and Major Highways', '- Night Patrol', '- Walking Bridge to Highline Canal Trail', '- Responsive Maintenance Team', '- Professional on Site Management', '- Seasonal Pool', 'Pet Policy', "Restricted dog breeds: Pit Bulls, Rottweiler's, Presa Canario, German Shepherds, Huskies, Malamutes, Dobermans, Chowchows, St. Bernard's, Great Danes, Akitas, Terriers (Staffordshire) and American Bull dogs, Karelian Bear dog.", 'Any hybrid or mixed breed of one of the aforementioned breeds.', 'Poisonous Animals: Tarantulas or Piranhas.', 'Exotic Animals: Reptiles (snakes, iguanas), Ferrets, Skunks, Raccoons, Squirrels, Rabbits, or Birds (parrots, cockatiels macaws).- Weight Limited of 65 lbs.', 'Driving Directions', 'Please contact us for turn by turn directions', 'Office Hours', 'Monday: 9 AM – 6 PM', 'Tuesday: 9 AM – 6 PM', 'Wednesday: 9 AM – 6 PM', 'Thursday: 9 AM – 6 PM', 'Friday: 9 AM – 6 PM', 'Saturday: 10 AM – 4 PM', 'Sunday: Closed', 'Westridge', '445 North Helena Street, Aurora, CO, 80011', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'Wdrf5VUI']
